story: I believe You have asked yourself questions like – What is success to me? Do I even want to be successful? How to find the inner drive for waking up in the mornings? What makes me truly happy? Am I happy now?
Yap! Actually, I was there… constantly asking myself those questions. I had lost YEARS looking for things that excite me and make me happy.

One day I came across Japanese philosophy and a book called "Ikigai" and it consumed me. Not only I had to tell the world about this amazing Japanese perception – I had to do it in the most interactive way possible.
Soon enough the idea of creating a card game came. Long story short, I can now help anyone get to know IKIGAI concept through a playful activity called IKIGAIN Cards.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The family behind the Ikigain journey
team.introduction: Finding purpose in life can be a winding and sometimes uncertain path. We often find ourselves at crossroads, asking, "What is my purpose?" It's a deeply personal question, yet universal in its resonance. For me, the answer began to reveal itself through self-reflection, discovery, and a powerful tool: the Ikigain self-discovery cards. These cards helped me tap into my true passions and opened doors to the next chapter of my life.
team.ikigaiPower: Ikigai, a Japanese concept meaning "reason for being," is the intersection of what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what you can be paid for. For me, this concept became a guiding star. Through the Ikigain cards, I embarked on a journey of self-discovery, reflecting on my desires, skills, and the contributions I wanted to make to the world.
team.discovery: As a mother, I understand firsthand the exhaustion that follows childbirth. The sleepless nights, the constant demands, and the physical and emotional drain—it can feel overwhelming. I wanted to find a way to help other mothers who feel this same exhaustion. This led me to discover my own Ikigai: creating products that are not only useful but also deeply meaningful.
team.cardsHelp: The Ikigain self-discovery cards provided me with clarity, helping me define my passions and understand how I could turn them into something valuable for others. Through daily reflection and commitment to this process, I found my way to a purpose that energizes me every day. This is the power of Ikigai—finding that perfect harmony between passion, mission, and profession.
team.whyDiscovery: Whether you're a mom navigating the challenges of parenthood, a professional seeking more fulfillment in your career, or someone simply trying to understand what brings joy and meaning into your life, self-discovery is key. Taking time to reflect and listen to your inner voice can unlock insights that lead you to your true purpose. The Ikigain self-discovery cards offer a structured, yet gentle way to explore these parts of yourself.
team.conclusion: My journey isn't unique—many of us feel the desire to live more purposefully, to find our Ikigai. With tools like the Ikigain self-discovery cards, you can embark on your own journey toward a fulfilling life. Let's embrace the next chapter of life together, guided by our Ikigai.
team.familyIntro: As you all know, my name is Sindy, and I am the founder of this incredible Ikigain journey. But I'm not walking this path alone—my family is at the core of everything I do. My husband, Karlis, is not only my partner in life but also a driving force behind our business. With his deep expertise in eCommerce, especially on Amazon, we've been able to bring the IKIGAIN brand to life in a way that reaches people far and wide.
team.daughter: And of course, there's our daughter, Gabriel. She's not only the light of our lives but also our official product tester! Every product we create is tested and loved by Gabriel. Her comfort and happiness are always top of mind, which is why I know our products will resonate with other parents.
team.dedication: As a family, we're dedicated to sharing the values of Ikigai and helping others find their own purpose and joy. We're excited to continue this journey with you and are always working on creating new products that inspire, comfort, and bring a sense of purpose to daily life.
team.connectDescription: I'd love to connect with you personally and continue this conversation! You can find me on LinkedIn, where I share more about my Ikigain journey, tips for finding purpose, and insights into entrepreneurship. My husband, Karlis, is also on LinkedIn if you're interested in the world of eCommerce, Amazon strategies, or just want to learn more about our brand-building journey.

ikigainCards.title: What Is Ikigai?
ikigainCards.description: Ikigain is a card game specially made for self-coaching and self-observation inspired by the Japanese philosophy of Ikigai – the reason for living. This seemingly playful activity can do so much as a move towards gaining happiness, satisfaction, and a sense of fulfillment.
details: Ikigain consists of 35 question & task cards divided into 5 chapters – the Heart, the Lungs, the Hands, the Mind, and the Soul. Each question & task card consists of three parts or three tasks – one to think about, one to write an answer to, and one to make into action.
There is no right or wrong way to fill Ikigain cards. Only by doing, you will find the way you feel more pleased with.

heart.title: What you Love
heart.subtitle: The Heart
heart.description: The Heart chapter will help You to define the things that excite, interest & enliven You and without which You couldn't imagine Your life.

lungs.subtitle: The Lungs
lungs.description: The Lungs chapter is about finding Your place in the world. The tasks will lead You to the realization of Your true potential and encourage You to experiment & explore more.

hands.title: What can you be paid for?
hands.subtitle: The Hands
hands.description: The Hands chapter will guide You to understand what You can be paid for. The tasks will help You to realize Your economic potential and find ways to monetize Your skills.
